name: Vurdratias
description:
In the land of "Vurdratias" you must  grind up the experience to fight new mobs and travel new places on the small map, in fact this is the only patch of known land on this planet though people have searched high and low, your a kung fu girl named "Poppi" you will meet up with your friends and even have a pet Dragon! To save you need "Save Scrolls" and must go to chests to save, no need to buy the 1st one you will have one, but you can buy beer of which only "Poppi" can drink and heal from, upon exiting a chest 1 Save scroll will always be used, so try to not buy them unless you want to save, and with that happy adventures in "Vurdratias".

In the (Paid) Version [you will get (1 exclusive character) to your party by going Easy mode], Easy mode is so you can "Auto" fight and not worry about dying that easily, whereas both Demo and Paid if you choose, Normal, then fights are very "Manual" and shouldn't be "Auto". Both variations are grindy and hard-ish, but the difference is you will find it easier,  with 1 extra member at the start.
